title: Shawl Fragment, 1901–25
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking twill, free shuttle detail
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould
description: Kashmir shawl. Elaborate flowerheads on scrolling stems with fine small leaves, buds, and small flowers; scrolling floral guard border with decorated guard strips.  In yellows, orange, vermillion, cerise pinks, greens, purples, blue, on bright turquoise ground.  Guard band on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl Fragment, 1901–25.
1901–25. Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking twill, free shuttle detail. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. G. Glen Gould. 1952-105-77.
